content.prompt: At the time of the Dome of the Rock’s construction, Muslim practitioners in Jerusalem were meant to recognize the triumph of the new faith of Islam through which external aspect of the structure?

choices.label: Its symbolic location at a sacred religious site
Its concentric aisles that allow circumambulation
Its Qur’anic frieze that is visible throughout the city
Its integrated position in a bustling city center

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.2: Purpose and Audience in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
